My First Post with Tags and Categories

Learning how to organize content in Jekyll

January 15, 2024 1 min read tutorial, jekyll beginner, web-development, static-sites, blogging

Welcome to My First Post!

This is an example of how to create a Jekyll post with proper tags and categories.

What are Categories?

Categories are broad topics that group your posts. Think of them as the main sections of your blog:

  • Tutorial
  • Personal
  • Technology
  • Travel

What are Tags?

Tags are more specific keywords that describe the content of your post:

  • beginner
  • advanced
  • web-development
  • javascript
  • css

Content Example

Here’s some sample content to show how the post looks:

Code Example

1
2
3

def hello_world
  puts "Hello, Jekyll!"
end

Lists Work Too

  • Point one
  • Point two
  • Point three

That’s it! This post will now appear on your site with the specified categories and tags.

Welcome to my site

This is a brief description of your site. You can customize this in _config.yml
